original_text: And he commanded the steward of his house, saying, Fill the men's sacks with food, as much as they can carry, and put every man's money in his sack's mouth.
korean_text: 요셉이 그의 집 청지기에게 명하여 이르되 양식을 각자의 자루에 운반할 수 있을 만큼 채우고 각자의 돈을 그 자루에 넣고

sentences.original_text: And he commanded the steward of his house
saying, Fill the men's sacks with food
sentences.korean_translation: 이르기를, 그 사람들의 자루에 음식을 채워라

sentences.original_text: as much as they can carry
and put every man's money in his sack's mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 각 사람의 돈을 그 자루의 입구에 넣어라
